item.title: Early Stimulated Immune Responses Predict Clinical Disease Severity in Hospitalized COVID-19 Patients
item.author: adrigabzu@sund.ku.dk (Adrian G. Zucco)
item.description: The immune pathogenesis underlying the diverse clinical course of COVID-19 is poorly understood. Currently, there is an unmet need in daily clinical practice for early biomarkers and improved risk stratification tools to help identify and monitor COVID-19 patients at risk of severe disease.
